caption.title: ToE and pace of climate change in ecosystem drivers under a mitigation scenario.
caption.p: Multi-model median of the year when climate change trend exceeds the range of natural seasonal variability (see ‘Methods' section) for ( a) SST, ( b) PP, ( c) pH and ( d) interior oxygen content in a mitigation scenario (RCP4.5). Note the different colour scales for each variable. ( e– h) Number of years between the start of climate change and the signal emerging (see ‘Methods' section). White areas indicate where ecosystem stress does not emerge above the range of seasonal variability for that parameter by 2100.
